requirements.description: As a user I would like to be able to save filter configurations
requirements.title: Saved Filters

requirements.description: I should be able to lock one requirement for edit from other users
requirements.title: Requirement Edit locking

requirements.description: I should be able to view the link popup window from any link button.
requirements.title: Links from Object preview inaccessible

requirements.description: This means creating a history entry of specific meta data changes.
requirements.title: Track any change to object

requirements.description: Users should not be able to create requirements until initial project configuration is complete.
requirements.title: Project Initialization
Project key displays caps, but isn't.

requirements.description: We should be able to import requirements for easy backup and restructuring.
requirements.title: Import Requirements

requirements.description: Anywhere a drop down or selection exists we should be able to fuzzy search the metadata of the object to help narrow down links or other object related searches
requirements.title: Fuzzy Combo Filtering

requirements.description: Users should be able to create accounts and have individual sessions
requirements.title: User Session Management

requirements.description:
The ability to create traceable links between requirements, design elements, test cases, and other artifacts.

Links can be directional (e.g., "satisfies," "derives from") and support impact analysis for changes, flagging "suspect" links when modifications occur.

Enables end-to-end traceability views, matrices, and reports to verify coverage and identify gaps.
requirements.title: Traceability matrix

requirements.description: These description text boxes aren't properly keeping or allowing formatting, either in the text box itself or in the rendered display. These should be upgraded to actual Web based "Text editors"
requirements.title: Description Text isn't keeping formatting

requirements.description:
Tracks changes to requirements over time with baselining, which creates snapshots of modules at key milestones.

Supports versioning, history tracking, and comparison of baselines to manage evolving projects.

Integrates with configuration management for controlled access and audits.
requirements.title: Change Management and Version Control

requirements.description:
Multi-user environment with role-based access control (RBAC) to ensure secure sharing among teams.

In DOORS Next Generation, it offers web-based collaboration on the Jazz platform, allowing real-time editing, comments, and reviews.
Classic DOORS supports database sharing for distributed teams.
requirements.title: Collaberation

requirements.description:
Built-in tools for querying, filtering, and analyzing requirements using views, wizards, and custom scripts (via DOORS eXtension Language or DXL).
Generates reports, traceability matrices, and metrics (e.g., coverage percentages, change impact).
Supports compliance reporting for standards like ISO 26262 or DO-178C in regulated industries.
requirements.title: Analysis and Reporting

requirements.description:
Integrates with other IBM tools (e.g., Rational Quality Manager for testing, Rational Team Concert for agile planning) and third-party applications via OSLC (Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration).
Customizable through DXL scripting for automation, such as custom views or data exports.
requirements.title: Integration and Extensibility

requirements.description: The Tree should be able to dynamically be sized for ease of navigation
requirements.title: Requirements tree unable to be resized

project.name: Lineage
project.description: The live requirements for this very web project
